name: Zaw Ye Htike
heroDesc: JavaScript-focused developer creating scalable, user-friendly applications. Creator of BaitoKanri.
aboutDesc: I’m a Japan-based web developer focused on real-world problem solving. I value clean UI, maintainable code, and performance. BaitoKanri was built to help students manage part-time jobs efficiently.
openToWork: Open for freelance and full-time opportunities.
